intents.response: Hello! How can I help you?
We have general practitioners, ophthalmologists and otolaryngology
We accept VISA, Mastercard, PIX, cash and Paypal!
We opening at 7 am and close at 5 pm, Monday through Frinday. On Sartudays we are open from 8am to 1pm.
We need your full name, zip code, health insurance plan and medical record to make our register.
